sections.title: üîß Query Formatter
sections.description: Essential text processing and epoch conversion tools for developers and testers:

features.name: Data Manipulation
features.description: Add/remove commas, single/double quotes to text data

features.name: Text Analysis
features.description: Count characters (with/without spaces), words, and data elements

features.name: Duplicate Management
features.description: Remove duplicate entries and find unique values in datasets

features.name: Epoch Time Converter
features.description: Convert epoch timestamps to human-readable dates with timezone support (UTC, IST, EST, SAST)

features.name: Date Calculator
features.description: Calculate new epoch times by subtracting minutes from existing timestamps

features.name: Human Date to Epoch
features.description: Convert custom date/time inputs to epoch format with timezone selection

features.name: Live Clock Display
features.description: Real-time epoch timestamp with multiple timezone displays

sections.title: üîÑ Conversion Suite
sections.description: Comprehensive conversion utilities and advanced tools:

features.name: Encoding Converters
features.description: Hex‚ÜîText, Binary‚ÜîDecimal, Base64 encode/decode, URL encode/decode

features.name: Text Utilities
features.description: Case converter (6+ formats), text reversal, regex escaping

features.name: Security Tools
features.description: JWT decoder, API key generator, PassCraft password generator with customization

features.name: Color Converter
features.description: HEX‚ÜîRGB‚ÜîHSL conversion with visual preview and color name lookup

features.name: Markdown Pipeline
features.description: Natural Language‚ÜíMarkdown‚ÜíHTML converter with live preview

features.name: Date‚ÜíEpoch Tool
features.description: Generate date ranges with custom intervals and bulk epoch conversion

features.name: ID Calculator
features.description: Generate sequential database IDs with custom increments

features.name: Duplicate Analyzer
features.description: Advanced duplicate detection with statistics and export options

features.name: CSV/TSV Processor
features.description: Parse, validate, and export data tables with sorting and filtering

features.name: üñºÔ∏è Image Processor
features.description: Compress, resize, and convert images (JPEG, PNG, WebP) with quality control

features.name: XML Validator
features.description: Validate XML syntax with detailed error reporting and line/column highlighting

features.name: XML to Block XML
features.description: Convert standard XML to block XML format for better readability

features.name: JSON to XML
features.description: Transform JSON data structures to properly formatted XML

features.name: Error Detection
features.description: Intelligent error handling with precise location reporting for malformed XML

sections.title: üåê JSON Conversion
sections.description: Web query and JSON processing utilities:

features.name: Query to JSON
features.description: Convert web query strings to formatted JSON objects

features.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
features.description: Handle URL encoding and decoding for web development

features.name: JSON Validator
features.description: Validate JSON syntax and format with error highlighting

features.name: XML to JSON
features.description: Convert XML documents to JSON format for API consumption

features.name: Side-by-Side Comparison
features.description: Visual text comparison with addition/deletion highlighting

features.name: Difference Statistics
features.description: Count additions, deletions, and modifications between texts

features.name: Unified Diff View
features.description: Standard unified diff format for detailed change tracking

features.name: Copy-Paste Friendly
features.description: Easy import of content from various sources for quick comparison

features.name: Auto-Detection
features.description: Automatically detect programming languages (SQL, JSON, XML, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Python, Java, C/C++, PHP)

features.name: Code Formatter
features.description: Beautify and properly indent code for better readability

features.name: Code Minifier
features.description: Compress code by removing whitespace and unnecessary characters

features.name: Language Support
features.description: Comprehensive support for web and programming languages

sections.title: üß™ Case Master
sections.description: Test case management and Excel export tools:

features.name: Test Case Builder
features.description: Convert descriptive test cases to structured pipe-separated format

features.name: Excel Export
features.description: Generate downloadable Excel files with formatted test case tables

features.name: HTML Preview
features.description: Preview test cases in formatted HTML table before export

features.name: Template Support
features.description: Standard test case template with TestID, Name, Category, Priority, Objective, etc.

features.name: Copy to Clipboard
features.description: Quick copy functionality for sharing formatted test cases

features.name: Location Lookup
features.description: Convert addresses and place names to precise coordinates

features.name: Coordinate Display
features.description: Show both point coordinates and bounding box area coverage

features.name: GeoJSON Converter
features.description: Transform coordinates to GeoJSON format for mapping applications

features.name: Map Integration
features.description: Direct links to OpenStreetMap for visual location verification

features.name: Format Support
features.description: Handle XML coordinate formats and plain lon/lat pairs

features.name: Real-Time Processing
features.description: Live conversion and formatting as you type in many tools

features.name: Copy Buttons
features.description: One-click copy functionality throughout the application

features.name: Batch Operations
features.description: Process multiple items simultaneously in supported tools

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Comprehensive error messages with helpful suggestions

features.name: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Fully functional on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

features.name: No Registration
features.description: All tools work instantly without account creation or login

features.name: Privacy First
features.description: All processing happens locally in your browser
